### Datasets

Bacterial soap. A designed experiment where a student evaluated four different types of bacterial soap. You can find [a description][bac1] and [the data][bac2] in tab delimited form.

Achim Zeileis, Christian Kleiber, Simon Jackman. Regression Models for Count Data in R. Vignette. Available in [pdf format][vig1]

Poisson Regression | R Data Analysis Examples. Available in [html format][ucl1].


[bac1]: https://dasl.datadescription.com/datafile/baterial-soap/
[bac2]: https://dasl.datadescription.com/download/data/3561

[vig1]: https://cran.r-project.org/web/packages/pscl/vignettes/countreg.pdf

[ucl1]: https://stats.idre.ucla.edu/r/dae/poisson-regression/
